title: Prosecutor Apologizes For Putting Innocent Man On Death Row
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish talks to prosecutor Marty Stroud, who put Glenn Ford on death row for the 1983 murder of a jeweler in Shreveport, La. Ford was recently released after nearly 30 years in prison.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
